summary: A few new baked item recipes for Hearthfire ovens.
descriptionHtml:
Some new baked item recipes for the Hearthfire ovens:
[size=2]
[/size][list][*][size=2]Battenberg[/size]
[*][size=2]Cupcakes[/size]
[*][size=2]Muffins[/size]
[*][size=2]Cookies[/size]
[*][size=2]Doughnuts[/size]
[*][size=2]Tarts[/size]
[/list]
All meshes and textures are the work of Insanity Sorrow and are available as a modder's resource at [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1203-insanitys-food-stuffs-resource/]TES Alliance[/url]. I've only done the CK donkey work, putting the items in the game and making recipes.

[i]
Made by request for Hasskar.
